Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
A unit made primarily from machinery and electronics. Mechanical units are vulnerable to Arc damage and take reduced damage from Psionic damage.
一种主要由机械和电子元件构成的单位。机械单位更容易受到电弧伤害，但受到的灵能伤害更少。
A cybernetic organism composed of both mechanical and biological parts. Cyborgs have an inherent {CyborgResistance} resistance to all status effects.
由机械和生物组件组成的神经机械生物。半机器人对所有状态效果天生拥有 {CyborgResistance} 抵抗。
A silicon-based lifeform. Mineral units are vulnerable to Biochemical damage and take reduced damage from Arc and Thermal damage. They are immune to all Damage over Time status effects.
一种硅基生命形式。矿物单位更容易受到生化伤害，但受到的电弧和热能伤害更少。矿物单位对所有持续伤害效果免疫。
An energy-based lifeform. Ethereal units are able to pass through walls and have resistance against the Kinetic, Biochemical and Arc damage.
一种基于能量的生命形式。虚灵单位可以穿过墙体，对动能、生化和电弧伤害具有抵抗。
A heavier, stronger unit. Heavy units cannot be staggered by high impact attacks, and do not turn to face their attacker when flanked.
体型更重，实力更强的单位。重型单位不会因高度冲击攻击而动摇，并且被包抄时不会转身面向攻击者。
A unit which is usually bipedal, or at least vaguely humanoid in shape.
一种通常使用双足行走或是形态类似于人类的单位。
一种不具有智慧的单位。
This unit is mounted on an animal.
该单位骑乘在某只动物上。
This unit is immune to Psionic status effects and Morale changes.
该单位免疫灵能状态效果和士气改变。
侦察兵是机动性很强的侦察单位。
A biological plant lifeform. Plants are vulnerable to Thermal damage, but resistant to Arc damage.
一种生物植物生命形式。植物容易受到热能伤害，但对电弧伤害具有抵抗。

This unit can create new colonies if the Colonizer unit occupies an empty sector center. Colonies cannot be created in sectors adjacent to existing colonies.[br/]Building a new colony will remove the Colonizer unit.[br/]Each colonizer you build will cost {energyCost}, {crystalCost} and {productionCost} than the one before it.
如果殖民者单位占领了某个空的区域中心，就能建造新殖民地。新的殖民地无法建造在与现有殖民地相邻的区域中。[br/]建造新殖民地将会移除殖民者单位。[br/]你所建造的每一个殖民者将比上一个殖民者多消耗 {energyCost}、{crystalCost} 和 {productionCost}。
This unit cannot be affected by [damagephysical/] Damage or Effects.
该单位不受[damagephysical/]伤害或效果影响。
This unit cannot be affected by [damagethermal/] Damage or Effects.
该单位不受[damagethermal/]伤害或效果影响。
This unit cannot be affected by [damagethermal/] Status or Hazard Effects.
该单位不受[damagethermal/]状态或灾害效果影响。
This unit cannot be affected by Tactical Hazard Effects.
该单位不受战术灾害效果影响。
This unit cannot be affected by [damagepsyche/] Damage or Effects
该单位不受[damagepsyche/]伤害或效果影响
This unit cannot be affected by [damagepsyche/] Status or Hazard Effects.
该单位不受[damagepsyche/]状态或灾害效果影响。
This unit cannot be affected by [damagebio/] Damage or Effects.
该单位不受[damagebio/]伤害或效果影响。
This unit cannot be affected by [damagebio/] Status or Hazard Effects.
该单位不受[damagebio/]状态或灾害效果影响。
This unit cannot be affected by [damagewave/] Damage or Effects.
该单位不受[damagewave/]伤害或效果影响。
This unit cannot be affected by [damagewave/] Status or Hazard Effects.
该单位不受[damagewave/]状态或灾害效果影响。
This unit cannot be affected by any Damage, and Status or Hazard Effects.
该单位不受任何伤害、状态或灾害效果影响。
This unit cannot be affected by Status Effects.
该单位不受状态效果影响。
Status Effect: Damage Over Time Immunity
状态效果：持续伤害免疫
This unit cannot be affected by Damage over Time Status Effects.
该单位不受持续伤害状态效果影响。
This unit can move over land hexes.
该单位可以在陆地单元格上移动。
This unit can only move on water hexes.
该单位只能在水域单元格上移动。
This unit has increased movement on all terrain types.
该单位在所有地形类型上具有更快的移动速度。
This unit has increased movement on Roads, Plains and Volcanic terrain.
该单位在道路、平原和火山地形上具有更快的移动速度。
This unit has increased movement on Forest terrain.
该单位在森林地形上具有更快的移动速度。
This unit has increased movement on Hill terrain.
该单位在丘陵地形上具有更快的移动速度。
This unit has increased movement on Mountain terrain.
该单位在山地地形上具有更快的移动速度。
This unit has increased movement on Fertile Plains terrain.
该单位在肥沃平原地形上具有更快的移动速度。
This unit has increased movement on Rocky terrain.
该单位在岩石地形上具有更快的移动速度。
This unit has increased movement on Wetlands terrain.
该单位在湿地地形上具有更快的移动速度。
This unit has increased movement on Ruins terrain.
该单位在废墟地形上具有更快的移动速度。
This unit has been trained in crossing rivers, and does so at a greatly reduced move point cost.
该单位进行了过河训练，因此极大地减少了过河消耗的移动点数。
This unit is in a Colony Militia.
该单位属于殖民地卫队。
This unit is Flying, and is {flyingPenalty} harder to hit with most weapons.
该单位为飞行单位，因此大多数武器命中该单位的难度增加 {flyingPenalty}。
该单位拥有 {farsightVisionBonus} 视野范围。
This unit ends its turn and goes into a defensive mode. It becomes {DefensiveAccuracyTarget} harder to hit and cannot be flanked.[br/]If this unit is staggered, the defensive mode is canceled.
该单位结束回合并进入防御模式，命中难度增加 {DefensiveAccuracyTarget} 且无法被包抄。[br/]如果该单位被动摇，防御模式将被中止。
This unit ends its turn and goes into a defensive mode. It becomes {DefensiveAccuracyTarget} harder to hit and cannot be flanked.[br/]If this unit is staggered, the defensive mode is canceled.
该单位结束回合并进入防御模式，命中难度增加 {DefensiveAccuracyTarget} 且无法被包抄。[br/]如果该单位被动摇，防御模式将被中止。
This unit evades incoming attacks, and becomes {EvadeHitPenalty} harder to hit.
该单位将躲避袭来的攻击，使其命中难度增加 {EvadeHitPenalty}。

This unit ends its turn and goes into a defensive mode. It gains {DefensiveShields}, becomes {DefensiveAccuracyTarget} harder to hit and cannot be flanked.[br/]If this unit is staggered, the defensive mode is canceled.
该单位结束回合并进入防御模式，获得 {DefensiveShields}、命中难度增加 {DefensiveAccuracyTarget} 且无法被包抄。[br/]如果该单位被动摇，防御模式将被中止。

This unit ends its turn and goes into a defensive mode. It gains {DefensiveArmor}, becomes {DefensiveAccuracyTarget} harder to hit and cannot be flanked.[br/]If this unit is staggered, the defensive mode is canceled.
该单位结束回合并进入防御模式，获得 {DefensiveArmor}、命中难度增加 {DefensiveAccuracyTarget} 且无法被包抄。[br/]如果该单位被动摇，防御模式将被中止。

This unit ends its turn and goes into a defensive mode. It regenerates {DefensiveRegeneration}, becomes {DefensiveAccuracyTarget} harder to hit and cannot be flanked.[br/]If this unit is staggered, the defensive mode is canceled.
该单位结束回合并进入防御模式，恢复 {DefensiveRegeneration}、命中难度增加 {DefensiveAccuracyTarget} 且无法被包抄。[br/]如果该单位被动摇，防御模式将被中止。
防御模式：灵能科技护盾

This unit ends its turn and goes into a defensive mode. It grants itself and adjacent allies {DefenseModePsiTecShieldDefense}. It also becomes {DefensiveAccuracyTarget} harder to hit and cannot be flanked.[br/]If this unit is staggered, the defensive mode is canceled.[br/][br/][titleBrown]This triggers a Psionic Buff when the unit's turn ends[/titleBrown]
该单位结束回合并进入防御模式，使自身和相邻友军获得 {DefenseModePsiTecShieldDefense}，同时自身命中难度增加 {DefensiveAccuracyTarget} 且无法被包抄。[br/]如果该单位被动摇，防御模式将被中止。[br/][br/][titleBrown]该单位的回合结束后将触发一个灵能增益[/titleBrown]

This unit ends its turn and goes into a defensive mode. It grants [abilityblue]Obscured[/abilityblue] to all units in a 1 hex radius below it. This unit also becomes {DefensiveAccuracyTarget} harder to hit, gains [abilityBlue]Stagger Resistance[/abilityBlue] and cannot be flanked.[br/] If this unit is staggered, the defensive mode is canceled.[br/][br/][titleBrown]This triggers a Psionic Buff when the unit's turn ends[/titleBrown]

该单位结束回合并进入防御模式，使位于其下方 1 个单元格范围内的所有单位获得[abilityblue]模糊[/abilityblue]，同时自身命中难度增加 {DefensiveAccuracyTarget} 并获得[abilityBlue]动摇抵抗[/abilityBlue]。另外，该单位不会被包抄。[br/]如果该单位被动摇，此防御模式将被中止。[br/][br/][titleBrown]该单位的回合结束后将触发一个灵能增益[/titleBrown]

This unit ends its turn and goes into a defensive mode. It becomes {SubmergeHitChance} harder to hit, recovers {SubmergeRegen} and can't be flanked.[br/]If this unit is staggered, the defensive mode is canceled.
该单位结束回合并进入防御模式，命中难度增加 {SubmergeHitChance}、恢复{SubmergeRegen} 且无法被包抄。[br/]如果该单位被动摇，防御模式将被中止
This unit is {largeTargetPenalty} easier to hit with ranged attacks, and cannot make use of cover. It can be used by other units as cover.
使用远程攻击命中该单位的难度降低 {largeTargetPenalty} 且无法利用掩体，但可以被其他单位用来作为掩体。
This unit is {SmallTargetAccuracy} harder to hit with ranged attacks.
使用远程攻击命中该单位的难度增加 {SmallTargetAccuracy}。
This unit heals for {LifeAmount} whenever they deal damage with a melee attack. Only works on Biological and Cyborg units.
该单位使用近战攻击造成伤害时可治疗 {LifeAmount}。该技能仅对生物和半机械人单位有效。
Heals {LifeAmount} when attacking Biological or Cyborg units.
攻击生物或半机械人单位时，治疗 {LifeAmount}。
This unit will disappear at the end of combat.
该单位将在战斗结束后消失。
This unit gains {ExpIncrease} more experience when victorious in combat.
该单位在战斗胜利后可额外获得 {ExpIncrease} 经验。
float as in hovering above any type of terrain (ground and water)
This character is the Commander of their faction.
该角色是其阵营的指挥官。
float as in hovering above any type of terrain (ground and water)
This unit is Floating, enabling it to traverse every type of terrain at a move cost of {floatingMovementCost}, except Mountains, which cost {flyingMountainMovementCost}.
该单位悬浮在半空，可消耗 {floatingMovementCost} 穿过除山地地形外的所有地形类型，山地地形需消耗 {flyingMountainMovementCost}。
When this unit reaches elite rank it evolves (at the end of tactical combat).
This unit evolves when it reaches the Prime Rank.
该单位在达到精兵军阶后会进化。
gold medal is the highest level a unit can get in-game. Units can gain levels by fighting and for each level they gain they become stronger.
When this unit reaches elite rank it evolves (at the end of tactical combat).
A standard ship for naval combat.
This unit can move over land and water hexes.[br/]When in the water, unit is Immune to [abilityred]Burning[/abilityred] and [abilityred]Immolation[/abilityred] due to its capability to submerge.
该单位可在陆地和水域单元格上移动。[br/]位于水域单元格时，该单位能够潜入水下免疫[abilityred]燃烧[/abilityred]和[abilityred]焚祭[/abilityred]。
防御模式：植物根茎（强化）

This unit ends its turn and goes into a defensive mode. It burrows roots into the soil, healing {healAmount}[hp/], gaining +{ArmorAmount}[armor/] and becoming [abilityblue]Stagger Immune[/abilityblue] until the next turn.
该单位结束回合并进入防御模式，将其根茎扎入土地，治疗 {healAmount}[hp/]、获得 +{ArmorAmount}[armor/] 和[abilityblue]动摇免疫[/abilityblue]，效果持续至下一回合。
This unit can see concealed units within its vision range.
该单位可看见视野范围内的隐藏单位。
This unit is regenerating {RegenAmount}[hp/] each Tactical turn. This unit regenerates all of its [hp/] each Strategic turn.
该单位在每个战术回合将恢复 {RegenAmount}[hp/]，并且在每个战略回合将恢复全部[hp/]。
Unit is filled with rage, causing it to deal {RageDamageI} Damage and regenerate {RageHP}[hp/] per turn for each stack of Rage.
该单位充满了愤怒，使其能够造成 {RageDamageI} 伤害，并且每叠加一层“怒火”，该单位在每回合将恢复 {RageHP}[hp/]。

When a Biological, Cyborg or Arborian unit dies in battle, this gives this unit one stack of [abilityblue]Blood Fury[/abilityblue], increasing damage by {RageDamage} and regenerating {RageHP}[hp/] per stack. Up to {RageStacks} stacks.
当生物、半机械人或树人单位在战斗中死亡时，该单位将获得一层[abilityblue]血怒[/abilityblue]，每层提高该单位 {RageDamage} 伤害并恢复 {RageHP}[hp/]。最高可叠加 {RageStacks} 层。
The unit is able to walk over lava.
该单位可行走于熔岩之上。
Unit gains +{MoraleBonus}[happiness/] Morale when fighting on Forest Hexes.
单位在森林单元格中战斗时，获得 +{MoraleBonus}[happiness/] 士气。
Unit regeneration is increased by {healing} per turn while in friendly territory.
单位在位于友方领土时，恢复提高 {healing}。
The Assembly restore themselves with parts taken from fallen foes, healing them for {healing} after each battle.
半机械人可从阵亡的敌人身上搜刮零件来治疗自身，每次战斗结束后可治疗 {healing}。
The Kir'Ko are naturally adept at healing, increasing their Strategic Turn regeneration by {healing}.
奇尔寇天生擅长治愈，其战略回合恢复提高 {healing}。
Due to the likeness of the Arcadian climate to the Amazon home planet, all Amazon units gain {morale} when fighting in Arcadian terrain.
由于田园气候与亚马逊人母星的气候相近，所有亚马逊人单位在田园地形上战斗时获得 {morale}。
Due to the likeness of the Arcadian climate to the Vanguard home planet, all Vanguard units gain {morale} when fighting in Arcadian terrain.
由于田园气候与先锋母星的气候相近，所有先锋单位在田园地形上战斗时获得 {morale}。
Due to the likeness of the Arctic climate to the Assembly home planet, all Assembly units gain {morale} when fighting in Arctic terrain.
由于极寒气候与半机械人母星的气候相近，所有半机械人单位在极寒地形上战斗时获得 {morale}。
Due to the likeness of the Arid climate to the Dvar home planet, all Dvar units gain {morale} when fighting in Arid terrain.
由于干燥气候与矮人母星的气候相近，所有矮人在干燥地形上战斗时获得 {morale}。
Due to the likeness of the Arid climate to the Syndicate home planet, all Syndicate units gain {morale} when fighting in Arid terrain.
由于干燥气候与辛迪加人母星的气候相近，所有辛迪加人在干燥地形上战斗时获得 {morale}。
Due to the likeness of the Fungal climate to the Kir'Ko home planet, all Kir'Ko units gain {morale} when fighting in Fungal terrain.
由于真菌气候与奇尔寇母星的气候相近，所有奇尔寇在真菌地形上战斗时获得 {morale}。
Additionally, this mod grants the unit {OffensiveModDamage} increased damage on all abilities.
该模块能够使单位的所有技能伤害提高 {OffensiveModDamage}。
Additionally, this mod grants the unit {HealthModDamage}.
Additionally, this mod grants the unit {ArmorModDamage}.
Additionally, this mod grants the unit {ShieldModDamage}.
When destroyed, this unit will crash to the ground on a nearby hex, damaging anything on that hex.
该单位在被摧毁时将坠落至附近单元格地面，对该单元格上的所有物体造成伤害。
This unit's combat experience grants it {CritIncrease} increased critical hit chance.
该单位的战斗经验使其暴击率提升 {CritIncrease}。
This unit's combat experience allows it to ignore {LoSIgnore} of cover and unit in the way penalties with ranged weapons.
该单位的战斗经验使其在使用远程武器时忽略 {LoSIgnore} 因掩体和阻挡单位造成的惩罚。
This unit's combat experience increases its ranged weapon range by {RangeIncrease}.
该单位的战斗经验使其远程武器的射程增加 {RangeIncrease}。
This unit's combat experience grants it +{accuracyBonus}% accuracy when using overwatch.
该单位的战斗经验使其使用警戒时的准度 +{accuracyBonus}%。
This unit's combat experience grants it {ShrugoffValue} resistance against all Status Effects.
该单位的战斗经验使其获得对所有状态效果获得 {ShrugoffValue} 抵抗。
This unit's combat experience makes it {EvasionIncrease} harder to hit.
该单位的战斗经验使其命中难度增加 {EvasionIncrease}。
This unit's combat experience grants it a level of Stagger Resistance.
该单位的战斗经验使其获得 1 级动摇抵抗。
This unit's combat experience grants it Overwatch.
该单位的战斗经验使其获得警戒。
This unit's combat experience grants it {MoraleBoost} increased morale.
该单位的战斗经验使其士气提升 {MoraleBoost}。
This unit's combat experience allows it to ignore enemy Overwatch.
该单位的战斗经验使其无视敌人的警戒。
Used to say that an ability is an inherent part of a unit (e.g. Cats are inherently furry)
This unit becomes {amountPercentage} harder to hit for each hex it moved during its last turn.
该单位在上一回合中每走过一个单元格，命中难度就增加 {amountPercentage}。
Used to say that an ability is an inherent part of a unit (e.g. Cats are inherently furry)
This unit will disappear after a certain amount of turns.
该单位经过一定回合后将会消失。
This unit becomes {amountPercentage} harder to hit for each hex it moved during its last turn.
该单位在上一回合中每走过一个单元格，命中难度就增加 {amountPercentage}。
This unit cannot be affected by [damagephysical/] Status or Hazard Effects.
该单位不受[damagephysical/]状态或灾害效果影响。
This unit cannot be affected by [damageentropy/] Damage or Effects.
该单位不受[damageentropy/]伤害或效果影响。
This unit cannot be affected by [damageentropy/] Status or Hazard Effects.
该单位不受[damageentropy/]状态或灾害效果影响。
Unit is Immune to [abilityred]Burning[/abilityred] and [abilityred]Immolation[/abilityred] due to its capability to submerge underwater.
该单位能够潜入水下，免疫[abilityred]燃烧[/abilityred]和[abilityred]焚祭[/abilityred]。
All of your units gain [abilityblue]River Crossing Expertise[/abilityblue], allowing them to cross rivers for fewer move points.
你的所有单位获得[abilityblue]过河技艺[/abilityblue]，穿越河流时移动点数消耗更少。

This creature is embedded with Amazon technology to bring it under control and boost its combat capabilities.[br/][br/]The unit gains {damageBonus} damage, {accuracyBonus} accuracy and {defenseBonus}.
该生物嵌入了亚马逊科技，使其受到了控制并强化了战斗能力。[br/][br/]单位获得 {damageBonus} 伤害、{accuracyBonus} 准度和 {defenseBonus}。

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
{levitationMovementCost}: 4 [moveWalk/]; {roadAndWaterFloatingMovementCost}: 3 [moveWalk/]; French added, other languages need update.
